files.patch:
@@ -2665,0 +2665,3 @@
+  // This instruction should be SSE encoded with the REX2 prefix when an
+  // extended GPR is present. To be consistent when UseAPX is enabled, use
+  // this encoding even when an extended GPR is not used.
@@ -6397,0 +6400,3 @@
+  // This instruction should be SSE encoded with the REX2 prefix when an
+  // extended GPR is present. To be consistent when UseAPX is enabled, use
+  // this encoding even when an extended GPR is not used.
